                  DISPLAY_Service PROC
;;;89     /* Program Code  -------------------------------------------------------------*/
;;;90     void DISPLAY_Service(void) 
000000  e92d4ff0          PUSH     {r4-r11,lr}
;;;91     {   
000004  b091              SUB      sp,sp,#0x44
;;;92         static RTC_TimeTypeDef time_d;
;;;93         static RTC_DateTypeDef date_d;
;;;94         static uint32_t display_time = 0U;
;;;95         static uint32_t display_timer = 0U;

;;;97     	uint8_t disp_buff[DISPLAY_MESSAGE_SIZE], read_byte;
;;;98         
;;;99     	static enum
;;;100    	{
;;;101    		DISP_INIT   = 0U,
;;;102    		DISP_APP_RUN        
;;;103    		
;;;104    	}DISP_ServiceState = DISP_INIT;
;;;105    	
;;;106    	if(eComState == COM_PACKET_RECEIVED) RS485_Service();

00000e  f7fffffe          BL       RS485_Service
                  |L2.18|

;;;108    	/**		D I S P L A Y 		G U I 		S T A T E		S W I T C H		 **/

;;;111        {
;;;112            /**************************************************************************/
;;;113    		/**				I N I T I A L I Z E			D I S P L A Y				 **/
;;;114    		/**************************************************************************/ 
;;;115    		case DISP_INIT:
;;;116    		{
;;;117    			__HAL_TIM_SET_COMPARE(&htim2, TIM_CHANNEL_1, lcd_brightness);
;;;118    			LCD_Clear(BLACK);
;;;119    			BACK_COLOR = BLACK;
;;;120    			POINT_COLOR = WHITE;   
;;;121    			font_size = SMALL_SIZE_FONT;

;;;122    			DISPLAY_RoomNumberImage();
;;;123    			DISP_ServiceState = DISP_APP_RUN;
;;;124    			break;
;;;125            }
;;;126    		
;;;127    		case DISP_APP_RUN:
;;;128    		{
;;;129                if ((HAL_GetTick() - display_timer) < display_time) return;

;;;131                display_timer = HAL_GetTick();

;;;132                ClearBuffer(disp_buff, DISPLAY_MESSAGE_SIZE);

;;;133                /***********************************************************************
;;;134                **		D I S P L A Y		P O W E R		M O D E 	C H E C K

;;;139                if (HAL_SPI_Transmit(&hspi2, &read_byte, 1U, SPI_FLASH_TIMEOUT) != HAL_OK) Error_Handler();

;;;192    			}
;;;193    			else if(IsDISPLAY_UpdateInProgressMessageActiv())

;;;196                    display_time = DISPLAY_STATUS_TIME;

;;;273                        LCD_ShowChar(280U, Line3_M, servisMenu.system_id[3]);

;;;275                        
;;;276                        Int2StrSized(servisMenu.rs485_add, ((rs485_interface_address[0] << 8U) + rs485_interface_address[1]), 5U);
;;;277                        LCD_ShowChar(250U, Line4_M, servisMenu.rs485_add[0]);
;;;278                        LCD_ShowChar(260U, Line4_M, servisMenu.rs485_add[1]);
;;;279                        LCD_ShowChar(270U, Line4_M, servisMenu.rs485_add[2]);
;;;280                        LCD_ShowChar(280U, Line4_M, servisMenu.rs485_add[3]);
;;;281                        LCD_ShowChar(290U, Line4_M, servisMenu.rs485_add[4]);
;;;282                        
;;;283                        Hex2Str(&time_d.Hours,  1U, &servisMenu.date_time[0]);
;;;284                        Hex2Str(&time_d.Minutes,1U, &servisMenu.date_time[2]);
;;;285                        Hex2Str(&date_d.Date,   1U, &servisMenu.date_time[4]);
;;;286                        Hex2Str(&date_d.Month,  1U, &servisMenu.date_time[6]);
;;;287                        Hex2Str(&date_d.Year,   1U, &servisMenu.date_time[8]);
;;;288                        
;;;289                        LCD_ShowChar(150U, Line8_M, servisMenu.date_time[0]);
;;;290                        LCD_ShowChar(160U, Line8_M, servisMenu.date_time[1]);
;;;291                        LCD_ShowChar(170U, Line8_M, ':');
;;;292                        LCD_ShowChar(180U, Line8_M, servisMenu.date_time[2]);
;;;293                        LCD_ShowChar(190U, Line8_M, servisMenu.date_time[3]);
;;;294                        LCD_ShowChar(200U, Line8_M, ' ');
;;;295                        LCD_ShowChar(210U, Line8_M, servisMenu.date_time[4]);
;;;296                        LCD_ShowChar(220U, Line8_M, servisMenu.date_time[5]);
;;;297                        LCD_ShowChar(230U, Line8_M, '.');
;;;298                        LCD_ShowChar(240U, Line8_M, servisMenu.date_time[6]);
;;;299                        LCD_ShowChar(250U, Line8_M, servisMenu.date_time[7]);
;;;300                        LCD_ShowChar(260U, Line8_M, '.');
;;;301                        LCD_ShowChar(270U, Line8_M, '2');
;;;302                        LCD_ShowChar(280U, Line8_M, '0');
;;;303                        LCD_ShowChar(290U, Line8_M, servisMenu.date_time[8]);
;;;304                        LCD_ShowChar(300U, Line8_M, servisMenu.date_time[9]);
;;;305                        servisMenu.mode = 3U;
;;;306    				}	
;;;307                    
;;;308                    if(servisMenu.mode == 3U)
;;;309                    {
;;;310                        switch(servisMenu.item)
;;;311                        {
;;;312                            case 0U:
;;;313                            {
;;;314                                LCD_ShowChar(290U, Line8_M, servisMenu.date_time[8]);   // TIME & DATE:  YEAR 
;;;315                                LCD_ShowChar(300U, Line8_M, servisMenu.date_time[9]); 
;;;316                                BACK_COLOR = LGRAY;
;;;317                                POINT_COLOR = BLACK;
;;;318                                LCD_ShowString(0U, Line1_M, settings_item_1);           // EXIT SETTINGS MENU
;;;319                                break;
;;;320                            }
;;;321                            
;;;322                            case 1U:
;;;323                            {	
;;;324                                LCD_ShowString(0U, Line1_M, settings_item_1);           // EXIT SETTINGS MENU
;;;325                                BACK_COLOR = LGRAY;
;;;326                                POINT_COLOR = BLACK;
;;;327                                LCD_ShowString(0U, Line2_M, settings_item_2);           // RESTART CONTROLLER
;;;328                                break;
;;;329                            }
;;;330                            
;;;331                            
;;;332                            case 2U:
;;;333                            {	
;;;334                                LCD_ShowString(0U, Line2_M, settings_item_2);           //	RESTART CONTROLLER	
;;;335                                if(servisMenu.selected == 0U) BACK_COLOR = LGRAY;
;;;336                                else BACK_COLOR = GRAY;
;;;337                                LCD_ShowChar(250U, Line3_M, servisMenu.system_id[0]);   // SET SYSTEM ID x10000
;;;338                                break;
;;;339                            }
;;;340                                
;;;341                            
;;;342                            case 3U:
;;;343                            {
;;;344                                LCD_ShowChar(250U, Line3_M, servisMenu.system_id[0]);   // SET SYSTEM ID x10000
;;;345                                if(servisMenu.selected == 0U) BACK_COLOR = LGRAY;
;;;346                                else BACK_COLOR = GRAY;
;;;347                                LCD_ShowChar(260U, Line3_M, servisMenu.system_id[1]);   // SET SYSTEM ID x1000
;;;348                                break;
;;;349                            }
;;;350                            
;;;351                            
;;;352                            case 4U:
;;;353                            {
;;;354                                LCD_ShowChar(260U, Line3_M, servisMenu.system_id[1]);   // SET SYSTEM ID x1000

;;;356                                else BACK_COLOR = GRAY;
;;;357                                LCD_ShowChar(270U, Line3_M, servisMenu.system_id[2]);   // SET SYSTEM ID x100

;;;512                                else BACK_COLOR = GRAY;

;;;518

;;;520                        POINT_COLOR = WHITE;
;;;521                        servisMenu.mode = 4U;

;;;524    				return;
;;;525    			}
;;;526    			else if(IsDISPLAY_RefreshRequested())
;;;527    			{
;;;528    				DISPLAY_RefreshReset();
;;;529    				DISPLAY_Image(ROOM_NUMBER_IMAGE);
;;;530    				servisMenu.mode = 0U;

;;;540                        **		    B A C K U P     R T C       D A T E	    D A I L Y

;;;555                        disp_buff[2] = '.';
